title: The Adventures of Bob Torres: Coach by Day, Hero by Night

story.text: Bob Torres starts his week as usual, coaching local kids in soccer, unaware of the new powers he'd discover tonight. As he locks up the equipment shed, a strange, glowing orb grants him the power to manipulate time.
Using his newfound powers, Bob decides to extend each day by a few hours for extra coaching time. However, he notices the side effects of slight temporal distortions around town.
Bob realizes that his tampering with time might have negative consequences. He spends the day trying to control and understand his powers without causing chaos in the community.
A major dilemma arises when a bank robbery occurs. Bob uses his power to freeze time, successfully stopping the robbers but pondering the ethical implications of his actions.
While debating whether to keep or relinquish his powers, Bob uses them for a good cause, creating public awareness campaigns on safety and community help.
Bob decides to reveal his secret to his coaching team, seeking advice. They brainstorm how to best utilize his powers responsibly and for the betterment of others.
Bob uses his time-manipulation power one last time to undo the most dangerous changes he made, then the orb mysteriously disappears, leaving him normal but wise.

ending: And so, having tasted great power, Bob Torres returned to his coaching, forever changed yet grounded in the values that mattered most.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and the true measure of a hero is the wisdom to use it well.
